title: Can we give kids antibiotics 3 times a month?
body: Can we give kids antibiotics 3 times a month? I’m not sure what is going on here, but some children will sometimes require a few courses of antibiotics if an infection isn’t resolving. Sometimes curtain pernicious strains of Strep in certain children don’t respond to two rounds of Amoxicillin, so a third course with a new antibiotic needs to be used. They will be fine usually if they’re not intolerant to antibiotics. They may have some tummy issues but most do not. Strep does cause GI distress too. If you are asking can we give 3 doses a month to a child just because, I have no idea what the purpose for that would be.
